Help:Node.title: Books
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Books (system pending)
Important Commands: write, read, erase
{? equal | $(theatre.id) | IC | Books in IronClaw Online are full of information on guilds, houses, history and more. You may even want to write your own.
}
To read your book type, $(udat.chatchar)READ COVER or $(udat.chatchar)READ FIRST PAGE or $(udat.chatchar)READ SIXTEENTH PAGE. Some chapter books use the commands: READ FIRST CHAPTER or READ SIXTEENTH CHAPTER.
See Also: ,
